name: My Coloring Book - All In one
name_original: My Coloring Book - All In one
description:
my coloring book. Coloring game for Baby is fun learning, Baby learn alphabets, animals, fruits, flowers, vegetables, shapes, vehicles etc. Our painting Game for Baby is loaded with 150+ coloring pages that can keep your Baby busy for hours and make the learn. Happy paint and learn Baby.


All In One Coloring Book & Drawing Book - Baby Game is designed for Baby to develop coloring skills.
This game contains many drawing images which are optimised for mostly all android devices!

How to use Animals Coloring Book App:
- Select a coloring page for coloring
- Select the color you like
- Tap on the area you like to draw
- Save your car coloring pages with camera button
- Press zoom for catch the details
- Press erase for removing any color
- Slide the brushes to reach more colors

All In One Coloring Book & Drawing Book - Baby Game
- Lots of amazing coloring pages of fruits
- Good for everyone relaxing and cretivity development
- Extremely easy-to-use for all Baby
- Adapted for smartphones and tablets, any screen resolution
- All coloring pages are for free!
